publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3957 Claire Baker: University of Edinburgh Teaching Awards—That the Parliament notes the success of Edinburgh University Students’ Association’s Teaching Awards, which recognise the outstanding contribution of staff at the university; highlights that over 2,700 students nominated staff for being exceptional teachers and that over 620 staff were nominated; believes that the scheme is a positive way for students to push for high standards of teaching, especially in research-intensive institutions; congratulates other schemes being run at universities across Scotland; further highlights the teaching awards as best practice in recognising the hard work of staff at the University of Edinburgh and encouraging excellence in teaching, as well as in research. Supported by: John Park*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Cathy Jamieson*, George Foulkes*, Mike Pringle*, Hugh Henry*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Patricia Ferguson*, Robin Harper*

S3M-3957 University of Edinburgh Teaching Awards (lodged on 22 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Sarah Boyack*, Mary Mulligan*, Jackie Baillie*, Bill Kidd*, Karen Whitefield*, Helen Eadie*, Ken Macintosh*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Marlyn Glen*, Murdo Fraser*, Trish Godman*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-3957 Claire Baker: University of Edinburgh Teaching Awards—That the Parliament notes the success of Edinburgh University Students’ Association’s Teaching Awards, which recognise the outstanding contribution of staff at the university; highlights that over 2,700 students nominated staff for being exceptional teachers and that over 620 staff were nominated; believes that the scheme is a positive way for students to push for high standards of teaching, especially in research-intensive institutions; congratulates other schemes being run at universities across Scotland, and further highlights the teaching awards as best practice in recognising the hard work of staff at the University of Edinburgh and encouraging excellence in teaching, as well as in research. Supported by: John Park, Dr Richard Simpson, Cathy Jamieson, George Foulkes, Mike Pringle, Hugh Henry, Mr Frank McAveety, Patricia Ferguson, Robin Harper, Jamie Hepburn, Sarah Boyack, Mary Mulligan, Jackie Baillie, Bill Kidd, Karen Whitefield, Helen Eadie, Ken Macintosh, Marilyn Livingstone, Marlyn Glen, Murdo Fraser, Trish Godman, Gil Paterson
S3M-3957 University of Edinburgh Teaching Awards (lodged on 22 April 2009) Rhona Brankin*
S3M-3957 University of Edinburgh Teaching Awards (lodged on 22 April 2009) Rhoda Grant*
